patthana21.51:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana21.51:0.3_0: Instead, they used to perform the six sense fields.
patthana21.51:1.1_0: for the sake of seeing rightly, not for the sake of seeing the overwhelming of material possessions. They don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana21.51:1.1_2: This is the cause, the reason why the three kinds of determined. ...
patthana21.51:10.1_0: There are no coming to the next principle, not for the sake of transformation.
patthana21.51:2.1_0: if there is no ties of movement, not for the sake of hospitality.
patthana21.51:4.1_0: Nor do I take pleasure in the teachings of desire, not for the uprooting of the underlying tendencies.
patthana21.51:6.1_0: Ways of sensual desire, not for the removal of desire and lust.
patthana21.51:8.1_0: Not spending the remaining near to the boat, so that it doesn’t lead to uprooting the underlying tendencies.
